Reviews.Title: Virgin Mobile Slash Slider Cell Phone & Camera
Reviews.Author: aura717
Reviews.Content: I give it a five star because the phone is durable.The keyguard stops accidental calling.This phone has a larger key pad and also has a camera. I dropped it a couple of times, still works find. A good bargain for the money. aura717

ProductInfo.Features:
Prepaid Slider Cell Phone with Camera and Bluetooth
Display: 1.19" x 1.49" TFT screen (128 x 160 pixels)
Integrated speakerphone
Ringtones: MP3, animated and Real Music tones
Browser: Openwave 6.2
ProductInfo.Name: Virgin Mobile Slash - Prepaid Slider Cell Phone with Camera and Bluetooth
